lyric.verse: Mama watashi wo mite JANGURU JIMU no ue de Itsu made kuchibue wo fukaseru tsumori? Mou hi ga kureru wa Ohisama ga nomikomare Mou sugu kotori ga shinde yuku no yo Machikirenai wa Senaka ga samui
lyric.chorus: Habataku you ni Ochite yuku wa Yumemiru you ni Ochite yuku wa Datte watashi wa kogoeteiru no yo Akaku shita taru yurikago no zakuro
lyric.verse: Nee kami wo toite Kakiageru unaji ni kidzuite MIRUKU wa mou nomanai no Komoriuta sae Sutete shimatta
lyric.chorus: Ureta karada ga Afuredashite Kogeru you da wa Tomerarenai Akaku hadaketa mune ga nureteru no Soo habataku you ni Ochite yuku wa Yumemiru you ni Ochite yuku wa Datte watashi wa kogoeteiru no yo Akaku shita taru yurikago no zakuro

translator.translatorname: Kazu 'Omi' Kajihara, Marcelluss D. Nealy, Goshi Manabe

lyric.verse: Mom, watch me Till when do you think you'll make me whistle on the jungle gym The day is getting old The sun will be swallowed And the little birds are dying I can't wait My back is cold
lyric.chorus: I will fall like flying I will fall down like dreaming Because I am freezing A fresh and ripe pomegranate in the cradle
lyric.verse: Brush and comb up my hair Realize my nape I don't drink milk anymore I even forgot the holiday
lyric.chorus: Ripen body flows up I fell like scorching and I can't stop My bared red breast is wet Yes ... I will fall like flying I will fall down like dreaming Because I am freezing A fresh and ripe pomegranate in the cradle
